short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Synchronizes reactions to popular tv and movies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reaction Channels chrome extension allows you to select any two videos on most popular video hosting platforms and synchronise playback between them.  Pause, play, or skip forward and back from either video, and Reaction Channels chrome extension will keep the other video in step.

Popular Youtube Reactors sometimes record their reaction without the embedding the source video. This respects the copyright of the original source material, while allowing subscribers to watch their reaction if they play back their own legitimate version of the source video.

Reaction Channels chrome extension makes this simultaneous playback a more pleasant experience, you can customise the length of the reactor's introduction, and be sure both videos play back together, so their reactions match the source video.
